recommendations.title: AWS EC2 Rightsizing
recommendations.description: Rightsize EC2 instances to reduce costs. Consider downsizing or terminating underutilized instances.
steps: Audit and identify underutilized EC2 instances
Monitor and adjust instance sizes as needed

recommendations.title: AWS EC2 Spot Instances
recommendations.description: Utilize Spot Instances for non-critical workloads to reduce costs.
steps: Configure Spot Instances for non-critical workloads
Monitor and adjust Spot Instance configurations as needed

recommendations.title: Azure Blob Storage
recommendations.description: Consider migrating S3 buckets to Azure Blob Storage to reduce costs.
steps: Assess compatibility and migrate S3 buckets to Azure Blob Storage
Configure Azure Blob Storage for data storage needs
Monitor and adjust storage configurations as needed

recommendations.title: Google Cloud Storage
recommendations.description: Consider migrating S3 buckets to Google Cloud Storage to reduce costs.
steps: Assess compatibility and migrate S3 buckets to Google Cloud Storage
Configure Google Cloud Storage for data storage needs
Monitor and adjust storage configurations as needed
